channel.title: Advice on Networking
channel.description:
So I want to stream films to my PS3 and Xbox. Currently it lags really bad when I try and stream a 720p MP4 to them, so I'm thinking about using Ethernet instead. I am aware that the Xbox does not have a Gigabit port, while my PC and the PS3 do.
My main question is: will I need to get a Switch or a Router? [img]http://img526.imageshack.us/img526/7035/netp.png[/img]
Here is a pic I drew in MS Paint to explain more.
Help appreciated :D

item.title: Advice on Networking
item.dc:creator: @FWTV_Pain FWTV_Pain

My main question is: will I need to get a Switch or a Router?

Here is a pic I drew in MS Paint to explain more.

Help appreciated :D[/quote]

deffs a router … i also use a router and its most useful the only problem is trying to get a good price on 1 >.<

ollie now im just asking … u know how to put online a 508? ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Advice on Networking
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

I use a switch to provide connection to tivo and xbox from an Ethernet cable so that would be my recommendation

Read full topic
